about_the_game:
"Running UP"

Get ready for an exciting parkour adventure in Running UP, a simple and challenging game created by a single developer. Designed with passion and minimalism, this game delivers a straightforward yet thrilling experience that will test your reflexes, timing, and determination.

Game Overview:

In Running UP, the concept is simple: run, jump, and climb to reach the top of each level. With no in-game save feature, every attempt counts, making it an intense and rewarding experience. The minimalist design keeps the focus on gameplay, offering pure parkour fun for players who love a good challenge.

Key Features:

Simple Yet Engaging: Running UP focuses on straightforward gameplay that’s easy to learn but hard to master. Perfect for quick sessions or extended play.

Challenging Levels: Each level is uniquely designed with jumps, platforms, and obstacles that test your skills and push you to improve with every try.

No Save Feature: The absence of a save system means you’ll need to rely on your skills and persistence to make it through. It’s all about the thrill of the climb!

Solo Creation: Crafted entirely by one developer, Running UP is a heartfelt project that delivers a personal touch to the parkour genre.

Gameplay:

Navigate through a series of increasingly challenging levels, where precision and timing are your best allies. The game’s smooth and responsive controls ensure every jump and climb feels intuitive, allowing you to focus on mastering the parkour challenges ahead.

While Running UP doesn’t have flashy visuals or complex mechanics, its simplicity is part of its charm. It’s a game that invites you to focus on the thrill of movement and the joy of conquering obstacles, one level at a time.

Are you ready to rise to the challenge? Play Running UP now and see how high you can climb in this minimalist parkour adventure!

name: Running UP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 12th Gen Or Ryzen 5 7600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT Or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 12th Gen Or Ryzen 7 5700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 4070 Or AMD Radeon RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: walk on heights crossing a dangerous bend it may take you several hours to play this game if you fall down, you will lose all your progress
